snippet: Steelers Coach Mike Tomlin ruled Bell out of the first round of the playoffs on Friday after Bell missed a third straight day of practice with a hyperextended knee.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Pittsburgh Steelers star running back Le'Veon Bell will miss wild-card game against Baltimore Ravens with lingering knee injury; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Steelers Coach Mike Tomlin ruled Bell out of the first round of the playoffs on Friday after Bell missed a third straight day of practice with a hyperextended knee.

headline.main: Steelers’ Le’Veon Bell to Miss Wild-Card Game With Knee Injury
headline.print_headline: Steelers’ Bell Will Miss Wild-Card Game
